title: [Legit] [Paid] Website Testing for Indians
selftext:
Hello, the educational company, NeoCananda, based in Canada, is performing a PAID ONLINE TEST with Indians living in India to get insights for its website. 

The test will be performed through a 30-minute video meeting on Zoom, and the company is paying 1,000.00 INR for each participant.

If you are interested in being one of the testers, the first step is to respond to a screening questionnaire and confirm your fit to participate. 

Here is the link: [https://zfrmz.com/VqHXhAZea94A9YFux46U](https://zfrmz.com/VqHXhAZea94A9YFux46U)

Good luck
